description: General information about the price estimate, such as status, expected service date, patient, contact information, and various amount totals.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the price estimate record.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_CREATE_DT
columns.description: The date the estimate was created.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: User who created the estimate

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The service area associated with the price estimate.

columns.name: SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The service date specified in the price estimate.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The price estimate's status within the estimate workflow.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pending


Finalized


Completed


Voided


Replaced


Expired

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient requesting the price estimate.

columns.name: CONTACT_NAME
columns.description: The person requesting a price estimate, if they do not currently have a patient record (EPT).  If the person requesting the estimate does have a patient record, use PAT_ID to find their contact information.

columns.name: CONTACT_CITY
columns.description: The city of the contact person's address.  Used only if the person requesting the estimate does not currently have a patient record.

columns.name: CONTACT_ZIP_CODE
columns.description: The zip code of the contact person's address.  Used only if the person requesting the price estimate does not currently have a patient record (EPT).

columns.name: CONTACT_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The state of the contact person's address.  Used only if the person requesting the price estimate does not currently have a patient record (EPT).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CONTACT_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The country of the contact person's address.  Used only if the person requesting the estimate does not currently have a patient record (EPT).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CONTACT_PHONE_NUM
columns.description: The phone number of the person requesting the price estimate.  Used only if that person does not have a patient record (EPT).

columns.name: CONTACT_ALT_PHONE
columns.description: The alternate phone number of the person requesting the price estimate.  Used only if that person does not have a patient record (EPT).

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The primary coverage of the patient specified in the estimate.

columns.name: BENEFITS_INFO_ID
columns.description: Benefit information record (BEN) that is linked to the estimate.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The payor (EPM) associated with the patient's primary coverage.  This can be used to determine contracts and other pricing factors.  If the person requesting the estimate does not have a patient record (EPT), the user may still enter a payor for pricing purposes.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The benefit plan (EPP) associated with the patient's primary coverage. This can be used to determine contracts and other pricing factors in the price estimate.  If the person requesting the estimate does not have a patient record (EPT), the user may still enter the benefit plan for pricing purposes.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: REQUIRED_PREPAY_AMT
columns.description: Required patient prepayment amount.

columns.name: PARENT_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: Reference to the record from which this record was created as a copy.

columns.name: CONTACT_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The county of the person requesting the price estimate.  Used only if that person does not have a patient record (EPT)


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EXTERNAL_ID
columns.description: This items stores the external ID for the record.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor account associated with the estimate.�This can be populated if the patient has an existing guarantor account in the service area associated with the estimate, and will not be populated for prospective patients (when PAT_ID is blank).

columns.name: OVERALL_PERCENT_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Stores percent discount for the entire estimate. If set, this overrides all system-calculated discounts.

columns.name: AMOUNT_DUE_OVERRIDE
columns.description: Stores amount due for the entire estimate. If set, this overrides all system-calculated discounts.

columns.name: CONTACT_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: The house number of the contact person's address.  Used only if the value has been manually specified in the estimate.

columns.name: CONTACT_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The district of the contact person's address.  Used only if the value has been manually specified in the estimate.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CREATE_MYPT_ID
columns.description: The original MyChart user that created this estimate.

columns.name: HB_TTL_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The total of all HB charge amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_TTL_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The total of all PB charge amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: TTL_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The total charge amount on an estimate. On Resolute estimates, this does not include external provider charges.

columns.name: HB_SYS_TTL_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The total of the HB system-calculated charge amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_SYS_TTL_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The total of the PB system-calculated charge amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: SYS_TTL_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The total of all system-calculated charge amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: HB_TTL_ALLOW_AMT
columns.description: The total of all HB allowed amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_TTL_ALLOW_AMT
columns.description: The total of all PB allowed amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: TTL_ALLOW_AMT
columns.description: The total of all allowed amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: HB_SYS_TTL_ALLOW
columns.description: The total of all Hospital Billing (HB)�system-calculated allowed amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_SYS_TTL_ALLOW
columns.description: The total of all Professional Billing system-calculated allowed amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: SYS_TTL_ALLOW_AMT
columns.description: The total of all system-calculated allowed amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: HB_TTL_SP_AMT
columns.description: The total of all HB self-pay amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_TTL_SP_AMT
columns.description: The total of all PB self-pay amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: TTL_SP_AMT
columns.description: The total self-pay amount on an estimate. On Resolute estimates, this does not include external provider self-pay amounts.

columns.name: HB_SYS_TTL_SP_AMT
columns.description: The total of all HB system-calculated self-pay amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_SYS_TTL_SP_AMT
columns.description: The total of all PB system-calculated self-pay amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: SYS_TTL_SP_AMT
columns.description: The total of all system-calculated self-pay amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: HB_TTL_DISCNT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all HB discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_TTL_DISCNT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all PB discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: TTL_DISCNT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: HB_SYS_TTL_DISCNT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all HB system-calculated discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_SYS_TTL_DISCNT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all PB system-calculated discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: SYS_TTL_DISCNT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all system-calculated discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: HB_TTL_TAX_AMT
columns.description: The total of all HB tax amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_TTL_TAX_AMT
columns.description: The total of all PB tax amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: TTL_TAX_AMT
columns.description: The total of all tax amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: HB_SYS_TTL_TAX_AMT
columns.description: The total of all HB system-calculated tax amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_SYS_TTL_TAX_AMT
columns.description: The total of all PB system-calculated tax amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: SYS_TTL_TAX_AMT
columns.description: The total of all system-calculated tax amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: SOURCE_VISIT_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the patient contact associated with the visit when the estimate was created, if applicable.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason this estimate requires follow-up.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Needs billing review

columns.name: SOURCE_DETAIL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates where the information on this estimate originated from. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Scheduled Order


Emergency Visit


Surgical Case


Telehealth


Coded Procedure - Hospital Encounter


Coded Procedure - Appointment


Lab Requisition


Lab Visit


Other Encounter


Appointment


Dental Treatment Plan


Dental Visit


Dental Refresh


Dental Visit (HB)


Shopper - Patient


Shopper - Prospective Patient


Order Entry


Residential Hospital Account


Managed Care Staff


Member

columns.name: ADJUDICATION_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The adjudication source category ID for the estimate.  


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Resolute


Payer - Tapestry

columns.name: CUR_ACTIVE_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the currently active estimate in a replacement chain for any given estimate. If the estimate is not in a replacement chain, this item will match the estimate ID.

columns.name: EMAIL_ADDRESS
columns.description: Stores the email address of the patient or guest (shopper).

columns.name: ALTERNATES_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: Link to the estimate that holds the alternate procedures.

columns.name: OUTSTANDING_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: Link to the estimate that holds the outstanding procedures.

columns.name: HB_TTL_INS_PAID_AMT
columns.description: The total of all Hospital Billing (HB)�insurance paid amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_TTL_INS_PAID_AMT
columns.description: The total of all Professional Billing (PB)�insurance paid amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: TTL_INS_PAID_AMT
columns.description: The total of all insurance paid amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: EST_SPAN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item defines an estimate as a single or multi-visit type record: 0 - single visit estimate, 1 - multiple visit, treatment (parent) level estimate, 2 - multiple visit, visit (child) level estimate, 3 - outstanding, holds outstanding procedures, 4 - alternate, holds alternate procedures.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Single Visit


Visit Grouper


Grouped Visit


Outstanding


Alternate

columns.name: HB_TOTAL_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all estimated HB insurance and patient payment amounts.

columns.name: PB_TOTAL_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all estimated PB insurance and patient payment amounts.

columns.name: TOTAL_PAYMENT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all estimated insurance and patient payment amounts.

columns.name: TOTAL_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: The total copay amount passed on to the patient. For treatment estimates, this is the total copay amount passed on to the patient for all visits within the treatment.

columns.name: TOTAL_COINS_AMT
columns.description: The total coinsurance amount passed on to the patient. For treatment estimates, this is the total coinsurance amount passed on to the patient for all visits within the treatment.

columns.name: TOTAL_DEDUCTIBLE_AMT
columns.description: The total deductible amount passed on to the patient. For treatment estimates, this is the total deductible amount passed on to the patient for all visits within the treatment.

columns.name: TOTAL_ADDL_SP_AMT
columns.description: The total self-pay passed on to the patient due to reaching the insurance maximum. For treatment estimates, this is the total excess self-pay due to reaching the insurance maximum for all visits within the treatment.

columns.name: TOTAL_UPGRADE_SP_AMT
columns.description: The total upgrade amount passed on to the patient. For treatment estimates, this is the total upgrade amount passed on to the patient for all visits within the treatment. This only shows a value for PB dental estimates.

columns.name: TOTAL_DOWNGRADE_SP_AMT
columns.description: The total downgrade amount passed on to the patient. For treatment estimates, this is the total downgrade amount passed on to the patient for all visits within the treatment. This only shows a value for PB dental estimates.

columns.name: TOTAL_HMO_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: The total HMO copay amount passed on to the patient. For treatment estimates, this is the total HMO copay amount passed on to the patient for all visits within the treatment. This only shows a value for PB dental estimates.

columns.name: TOT_NON_COVERED_AMT
columns.description: The total noncovered amount passed on to the patient. For treatment estimates, this is the total noncovered amount passed on to the patient for all visits within the treatment.

columns.name: VISIT_GROUPER_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: If this is a visit-level estimate record on a multi-visit estimate, this item stores the grouper estimate record containing this visit estimate.

columns.name: FINALIZED_USER_ID
columns.description: Returns the user who finalized the estimate.

columns.name: EST_REPLACE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the primary reason that this estimate's parent was automatically replaced. This item will only be set if this is an automatic replacement estimate. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Visits added or removed


Procedure change


Coverage change


Charge amount change


Allowed amount change


Benefit change


Discount change


Other patient portion change
